entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Rename INumber<T>.Create<TOther> to CreateNumber<TOther> #65921
  • CI hitting vm assert waitResult == WAIT_TIMEOUT in the tiered compilation manager #65914
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration needs to have its ref file regenerated #65913

Closed

  • `Build Cross OS Linux DAC for Windows` fails to build on CI #65818
  • Consider source generator for AsnXml #45210
    Future
  • Augment Regex extensibility point for better perf and span-based matching #59629
    7.0.0
  • UnwindManagedExceptionPass1 crashes on virtual dispatch stub when handling System.NullReferenceException on macOS ARM64 #62058
  • Why there is nothing output of finalizer example code in the C# spec? #65845
  • Corerun not being copied over on windows 7 machines, causing many test failures #65906
  • Optimize symbolic regex Antimirov mode to avoid so much allocation #60918
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Rely on PGO for isinst/castclass #65922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Slightly more aggressive ASG reversal #65920
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Keep the volatility of `CLS_VAR`s in rationalization #65919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] WIP - fix a interpreter warning #65917
    NO REVIEW
  • Fix GC hole with multi-reg local var stores #65916
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move diagnostics for invalid `GeneratedDllImportAttribute` usage to generator instead of analyzer #65915
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Adding Regex.IsMatch(Span) and RegexRunner.Scan() methods #65473
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Delete unicode-data.h and related code, cleanup unused eglib functions #65751
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Disable System.IO.Tests.FileStream_DisposeAsync.DisposeAsyncFlushes test #65892
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: OSR jitstress fixes; enable struct promotion #65903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • `GetTypeFields` should return `ELEMENT_TYPE_BYREF`. #65880
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Startup scenarios #65911
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Generate fabricbot config for the machinelearning repo #65875
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Improved handling of Antimirov mode in Nonbacktracking Regex engine #65637
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • add RID for Ubuntu 22.04 #65483
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • [Mono] Enable generating SIMD intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector on Arm64 #65486
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve performance of decrypt one shots #65725
    area-System.Security
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix remaining COM warnings in crossgen2 #65297
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Change regex source generator to emit returns rather than jumps to NoMatch #65599
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unroll Equals and StartsWith for constant strings and spans. [0..32] chars #65288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • `ZeroObj` assertions #65257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #65675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update GenAPI usage and code clean-up #65887
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Keep Obsolete and EditorBrowsable attributes consistent between ref and src and DefineConst clean-up #65847
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make Is*Project properties unambiguous and improve IsGeneratorProject detection #65896
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • null-check the redirect context before using. #65910
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix ZipArchiveEntry names shown as corrupted on other zip programs #65886
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add AssemblyName overload for ILVerity.IResolver.Resolve method #65905
    area-ILVerification
  • Publish crossgen for pkg #65520
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 and 9 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Do not value number locals on the LHS #65902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch run reverts to old behaviour when --launch-profile flag is provided #24115

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Default parameters of interface type are silently set to null for string constants #59789
    17.2

Closed

  • Can't debug EditorFeatures layer #59673
    Backlog
  • GTD: Better name for project containing files retrieved via Source Link #59138
    17.2
  • `NotNullIfNotNullAttribute` doesn't work for nullable value-typed parameters #59764
  • Visual Studio 17.1 brown error messages when Source Generator triggered while generated files are open #59633
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Add GlobalOptions.SetBackgroundAnalysisScope and PythiaGlobalOptions External Access API #59794
    Area-IDE
  • Removed navigation target and navigation hint from namespaces #59793
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Disable Auto-Open behavior for Stack Trace Explorer (#59785) #59791
    Area-IDE
  • Workspace config options #59790
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Codeaction diagnostics #59787
    Area-IDE, LSP

Merged

  • Improve PDB source document project handling #59643
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Disable Auto-Open behavior for Stack Trace Explorer #59785
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Make the IDocumentNavigationSerivice entirely async. #59784
    Area-IDE
  • Global indentation options #59679
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers
  • AnalyzeDataFlow: Added missing handling for delegate construction from extension method #59745
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed odd naming suggestions #59674
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix more lock contention #59638
    Area-IDE
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unnecessary accesses on XML end tag #59771
    Area-Compilers
  • Add OmniSharpCompletionService.GetDescriptionAsync #59782
    Area-IDE
  • Update source-build dependency to source-build-externals #59549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bind declarations of checked conversion operators #59740
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Use the same codepath for computing light-bulb actions to determine if hte lightbulb shoudl appear at all. #59599
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [WASM] Better double (F64) support in MonoPlatform.ts #40432
  • ReUse installed .NET runtime #40431
  • Jquery menu navigation is not working at the initial load in Blazor server #40429
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware logs an "empty" message for Response when disabled #40427
  • Firefox temporarily shows reconnect dialog while navigating to new page #40425
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #40424
  • Razor automatic encoding inside <script> tags #40423

Closed

  • Intermittent System.NullReferenceException thrown at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.Filters.SaveTempDataFilter.OnStarting #40267
    7.0-preview3
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #40367
  • signalr ts client has a dependency on "node-fetch": "^2.6.1" has Governance Alert #40404
  • ResetPassword - move the decode of code to OnPost method #40203
    7.0-preview3

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable trimming for Http.Abstractions #40430

Merged

  • Intermittent System.NullReferenceException thrown at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.Filters.SaveTempDataFilter.OnStarting #40267 #40428
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Clean up indentation #40400
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Error when Hubs are registered as Singletons #40396
    area-signalr
  • Removed duplicated and nested dispatcher invoking. #40366
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • [WIP] Update installer/tests for ARM64 #39523
    area-runtime
  • Use libnethost to find hostfxr #39810
    area-runtime
  • Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40411
    area-infrastructure
  • feat (Minimal) : Add `EmptyResult` #40171
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • return value for single HttpContext parameter #40235
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix incorrect h2 header decoding. #40412
    area-runtime
  • Remove SocketException usage #38094
    area-runtime
  • Speed up contended HTTP/2 frame writing (500% gRPC h2 70x1 improvement) #40407
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [WinUI] Crashing issue in ScrollView with orientation horizontal #4951
  • [Windows] Grid has unusual padding at the bottom #4950
  • [iOS] [Android] Grid measuring auto size row incorrectly when using RowSpan #4947
  • Grid Column and RowSpacing don't display in the colour of its parent #4946
  • Security in MAUI we need the basic tampering checks #4943
  • .net MAUI on WEB #4941
  • Interfaced handlers and consistent mapper naming for Controls.Core Handlers #4940

Closed

  • Maui-Blazor iPhone gives memory error #4037
    .NET 7
  • [Bug] Incorrect measure/layout in item template #3154

PullRequests

Created

  • Update WebAuthenticator sample package versions #4945
  • Add more APIs to IDispatcher #4944
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/animation 🎬, p/0, Cost:M, Status:InProgress
  • [WIP] Enable Window Sizing #4942

Merged

  • Interfaced handler for SwipeItemView #4939
  • Enable File Picker in Blazor Android WebView #4928
    platform/android 🤖, area/blazor 🕸️
  • Refactor VersionTracking into interface #4891
    area/essentials 🍞

Updated

  • Flowdirection window #4936
  • [Blazor] Align our Blazor Maui template with the Blazor RTM template #4922
    area/blazor 🕸️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Does EFCore automatically parameterize Skip/Take values now? #27512

Updated

  • Allow mapping of get-only property one-way to database #13316
    Backlog
  • Support unidirectional many-to-many relationships through shadow navigations #3864
    7.0.0
  • Merge/Upsert/AddOrUpdate support #4526
    Backlog
  • Add support for dynamically extended queries as per LinqKit #15670
    Backlog
